body.p: Frankfort, Franklin County, Kentucky, grocer. Kenton County, Kentucky, native. Married to Susan M. Ford Alley in Scott County, Kentucky, on December 12, 1842. Father of Eleanora Alley, Kate Alley, James Alley, and Lewis Alley. Grocer in Franklin County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned four enslaved persons in Franklin County in 1850. Grocer in Frankfort in 1860. Owned twelve enslaved persons in Frankfort in 1860.
